statements: SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, email FROM Patients WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT patient_id, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY last_visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%heart%' ORDER BY last_visit_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, email FROM Patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE last_visit_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, email FROM Patients WHERE email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT patient_id, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, email, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Influenza' AND prescription IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, m.prescription FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.record_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_email FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT log_id, access_date, access_type FROM AccessLogs WHERE ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT patient_name, record_date, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob <= '2000-01-01';
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, a.access_date FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN AccessLogs a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.access_type = 'login';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM Patients;

SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, a.ip_address FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN AccessLogs a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE m.record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, email FROM patients WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT record_id, record_date, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, dob, email FROM patients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE access_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT record_date, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, doctor_name FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19' ORDER BY diagnosis;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_name, message FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, log_date, action_performed FROM patients JOIN access_logs ON patients.patient_id = access_logs.patient_id WHERE log_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY log_date;
